h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Chitin Staff Location
content: The Chitin Staff can be found in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow, upon defeating [ The Second Sister] in the Village of Lanxi.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chitin_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Chitin Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Chitin Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Chitin Staff can be found in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow, upon defeating [ The Second Sister] in the Village of Lanxi.
